(촀\0Wh—
\0why on earth are you stopping
to chat?!
\0 This is the time to RUN!

(촀\0Shoo!
\0 Shoo!
\0 You stay away from me!

(촀\0Th—
\0there are so many of them!
\0
What did you do to those wasps?!

(촀\0Aaaaah!
\0 Run like the wind!
\0
There's a scorpion after you!

(촀\0No! No! No! 
\0You stay away from me!
\0
Far away!

(촀\0Eeeegads, darling! 
\0What did you do
to that scorpion?! 
\0Run away!

(촀\0Gaaaaah! 
\0Noooo!
\0 Don't you come
NEAR me with that tarantula on
your tail!

I'm sorry, but—(촀\0there's a TARANTULA
after you! 
\0Don't you come near me!
